meanings.definition: A small pie or turnover filled with meat or vegetables.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a tasty pastie for lunch.
meanings.sent2: She bought a pastie from the bakery for a quick snack.
meanings.sent3: The pastie was so delicious, it disappeared in seconds!
meanings.sent4: The warm pastie was like a hug for my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly baked pastie filled the room.

meanings.definition: A small adhesive patch used to cover a nipple.
meanings.sent1: She wore a pastie under her dress for the dance performance.
meanings.sent2: Pasties are often used by dancers for modesty.
meanings.sent3: The pastie stayed in place even during the energetic routine.
meanings.sent4: Her sparkly pastie added a touch of glamour to her outfit.
meanings.sent5: The pastie matched her skin tone perfectly, blending in seamlessly.

meanings.definition: A small, round, flat piece of pastry or dough.
meanings.sent1: The recipe called for a pastie to top the pie.
meanings.sent2: She placed the pastie on the baking sheet to be cooked.
meanings.sent3: The pastie dough was so soft and easy to work with.
meanings.sent4: The golden-brown pastie looked like a little sun on the plate.
meanings.sent5: The flaky layers of the pastie melted in my mouth with each bite.
